p: The categorical variable was presented as number of carriers or noncarriers and its relevant frequency separately. A binary logistic regression model was used to compare categorical variables after adjusting for age and gender. Categorical variables contained the WO phenomenon assessed by WOQ-9 and cognitive impairment assessed by the MMSE. p < 0.05 was considered of statistical significance. We used odds ratio (OR) to evaluate the risk of each variable in the binary logistic regression model. An OR value of >1 was considered as a risk factor. 95% confidence interval (CI) was estimated.
